strings:
<voice_0x01000C8F><se_def>Ishmahri: Many moons have waxed and waned since human foot last trod this earth.
...Weary travellers, I welcome you now to the Land of the Moonshadow.

<voice_0x01000C90><se_def>Ishmahri: Enlighten me, what desire opened the Moonshadow window on this night?
No words... Your shoes can tell the tale.
<voice_0x01000C91><se_def>Ishmahri: ...So, Pavan longs to be reunited with his dearly beloved, Sasha.

<voice_0x01000C92><se_def>Ishmahri: You stand amazed, mouths agape in wonderment. Ah, forgive me.
I have yet to uncloud your eyes.

<voice_0x01000C93><se_def>Ishmahri: Children of the light of day...
Do you believe that memories are yours alone?

<voice_0x01000C94><se_def>Ishmahri: Your clothes, houses, tables and chairs...
The sky, the land...
They too remember each passing day.

<voice_0x01000C95><se_def>Ishmahri: Silently, they sleep in a dream world
of memories.
<voice_0x01000C96><se_def>Ishmahri: The moon's light may give shape to these dreams<...>these memories.
<voice_0x01000C97><se_def>Ishmahri: I cannot stir this daughter of the sun from her eternal sleep, but perhaps I can end your friend's waking nightmare.

<voice_0x01000C98><se_def>Ishmahri: Lead me to the castle.
Lead me to the scene of Pavan's misery.
